data.title: R I P Gerry Anderson
data.meta_description: Gerry Anderson the creator of Thunderbirds, Stingray, Captain Scarlet and Space 1999 has died age 83. My after school viewing wouldn't have been the same without those scary little puppets mincing across the Pye Vidmatic screen.
